body_text:
Hi @Harish Chaduvula <harish.chaduvula@paytm.com>

Please find the creatives request below

*1. Acer Type A *
- Same as Old Creatives ( KV)
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- BOB, Kotak, Federal, HDFC, HSBC, IDFC, Yes
- 5% or Upto ₹ 5000/- Cash Back
- 1st to 31st Aug
- 6, 9, 12
- Needed Creative = Whatsapp, Screensaver, Emailer, Whatsapp CT

*2.  Acer Type B*
- Same as Old Creatives ( KV)
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- Axis, HDFC CC & DC, ICICI CC & DC, SBI, SCB, BOB, Kotak
- Instant Discount upto Rs. 15,000 on select SKU (limited period offer)
- 1st to 31st Aug
- 6, 9, 12
- Needed Creative = Whatsapp, Screensaver, Emailer, Whatsapp CT

*3. Haier Type A *
- Same as Old Creatives ( KV)
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- AU, Axis, BOB, DBS, Federal, HDFC, IDFC, SBI, Yes
- up to 25% Cashback (max Rs. 25,000)
- 1st to 31st August 2025
- 3, 6, 9, 12, 18 months
- Needed Creative = Whatsapp

*4. Haier Type B ( Please note , need the same for 15 aug theme only)*
- Air Conditioners
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- AU, Axis, BOB, DBS, Federal, HDFC, IDFC, SBI, Yes
- up to 10% Cashback (max Rs. 4,000/-) on selected models
- 7th to 18th August 2025
- NCE : 3 months. LCE : 6 months

*May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes
you smile! ?*

*Vanshika Khurana*

2.  Acer Type B
- Same as Old Creatives ( KV)
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- Axis, HDFC CC & DC, ICICI CC & DC, SBI, SCB, BOB, Kotak
- Instant Discount upto Rs. 15,000 on select SKU (limited period offer)
- 1st to 31st Aug
- 6, 9, 12
- Needed Creative = Whatsapp, Screensaver, Emailer, Whatsapp CT

3. Haier Type A
- Same as Old Creatives ( KV)
- No Cost EMI, Low Cost EMI
- AU, Axis, BOB, DBS, Federal, HDFC, IDFC, SBI, Yes
- up to 25% Cashback (max Rs. 25,000)
- 1st to 31st August 2025

- Needed Creative = Whatsapp

4. Haier Type B ( Please note , need the same for 15 aug theme only)

May 2025 surround you with kindness, laughter, and everything that makes you smile! 🌻

Dear Vanshika Khurana,

We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a ticket has been created.
A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).

To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit

Thank you for your patience.
